fullText: This is the best musical to hit Broadway in years, and it couldn't have come at a better time. Miranda has created a work that is both historically grounded and startlingly contemporary.
dtliExcerpt: This is the best musical to hit Broadway in years, and it couldn't have come at a better time. Miranda has created a work that is both historically grounded and startlingly contemporary.

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The superlative language ('best musical to hit Broadway in years') combined with praise for Miranda's achievement and contemporary relevance indicates strong enthusiasm and recommendation. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses unqualified enthusiasm, labeling the musical as the best in years and highlighting its timely relevance.
